title: Light, fast & regenerative
text: EcoValue Chain transforms invasive water hyacinth into sustainable natural fiber, turning an environmental threat into a fast, scalable solution for climate resilience and circular design.

section.title: Why water hyacinth?
section.content: Water hyacinth is one of Bangladesh’s most invasive aquatic plants, clogging rivers, harming biodiversity, and disrupting livelihoods—yet it is also a rich source of natural fiber when processed responsibly.

section.title: Why EcoValue Chain?
section.content: By building a low-cost, youth-led fiber extraction process, EcoValue Chain converts this waste into eco-friendly raw materials for handicrafts, packaging, and sustainable products, creating value for both people and planet.
